    • Method Detail

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Description copied from interface: Layer
        Destroys this layer, removing it from its parent layer. Any resources associated with this layer are freed, and it cannot be reused after being destroyed. Destroying a layer that has children will destroy them as well.
        Specified by:
        destroy in interface Layer
        Overrides:
        destroy in class LayerGL

      • setSize

        public void setSize(float width,
           float height)
        Description copied from interface: ImageLayer
        Configures the size of this layer. The size defaults to the size of the image contained by the layer, but if it is set manually then the image will be scaled or repeated to fill the specified size.
        Specified by:
        setSize in interface ImageLayer
